messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Escaped convicts coming from the nebula star system have made their way onto your station. Have security ready to deal with them at any time, they are easily distinguished by their orange jumpsuits. Have a nice day!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a horde of energy draining parasites have swarmed into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The prisoners are now kill on sight. for kidnapping the ce and breaking into multiple heavily guarded areas. they have not abandoned their ids when. Kill them and you will get 50000 credits transfered into your bank account.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
the prisoners have murdered themselves over the credit deal.....




continue your shift as if nothing pecualiar just happened...

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Antechamber.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, not more than 15 [REDACTED] have swarmed into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Division.
